## Installation

You can install the development version of openai from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("irudnyts/openai")
```

## Authentication

```{r, eval = FALSE}
Sys.setenv(
    SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID = 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx'
)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
usethis::edit_r_environ(scope = "project")
```

**Note:** If you are using GitHub/Gitlab, do not forget to add `.Renviron` file to `.gitignore`!
